section_1.title: Short title and extent
section_1.description: This Act may be called the Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita, 2023. It extends to the whole of India.
key_points: Defines the short title of the Act
Establishes territorial jurisdiction over entire India

section_2.title: Definitions
section_2.description: Definitions of key terms used throughout the Act
key_points: Person - includes any company or association
Public - includes any class of the public or any community
Injury - illegally causing harm to person, reputation or property

section_4.title: Commutation of sentence of death
section_4.description: Provisions for commuting death sentence to life imprisonment
key_points: Government power to commute death sentence

section_5.title: Sentence of imprisonment for life
section_5.description: Life imprisonment means imprisonment for remainder of natural life
key_points: Cannot be commuted to term imprisonment without government approval

section_7.title: Amount of fine
key_points: No limit on fine amount unless specified

section_8.title: Sentence of fine
section_8.description: Procedures for fine collection and default imprisonment
key_points: Imprisonment in default of fine payment

section_9.title: Community service
section_9.description: New punishment of community service introduced
key_points: Alternative to imprisonment for certain offences
Court discretion in awarding community service

section_10.title: Nothing is an offence which is done by a person who is bound by law to do it
key_points: Acts mandated by law are not offences

section_11.title: Nothing is an offence which is done by a Judge when acting judicially

section_12.title: Nothing is an offence which is done in the exercise of the right of private defence
key_points: Right to defend person and property

section_13.title: Consent
section_13.description: Acts done with consent are generally not offences

section_14.title: Act done by a person bound, or by mistake of fact believing himself bound, by law

section_15.title: Act of Judge when acting judicially

section_16.title: Act done pursuant to the judgment or order of Court
key_points: Following court orders is not an offence

section_17.title: Act done by a person justified, or by mistake of fact believing himself justified, by law

section_19.title: Act likely to cause harm, but done without criminal intent, and to prevent other harm

section_20.title: Act of a child under seven years of age

section_21.title: Act of a child above seven and under twelve years of age of immature understanding

section_22.title: Act of a person of unsound mind
key_points: Unsound mind at time of act
Inability to understand nature and consequences

section_23.title: Act of a person who by reason of intoxication is incapable of knowing the nature of the act

section_24.title: Offence requiring a particular intent or knowledge committed by one who is intoxicated
key_points: May negate specific intent in some cases

section_25.title: Act not intended and not known to be likely to cause death or grievous hurt
key_points: No intent to cause serious harm

section_26.title: Act done in good faith for benefit of a person without consent

chapter_4.title: Of the Right of Private Defence

section_27.title: Right of private defence of the body and of property
section_27.description: Fundamental right to defend oneself and property

section_28.title: Right of private defence against the act of a person of unsound mind, etc.
key_points: Right exists even if attacker not criminally liable

section_29.title: Acts against which there is no right of private defence
key_points: No defence against public servants acting in good faith

section_30.title: Extent to which the right may be exercised

section_31.title: When the right of private defence of the body extends to causing death
section_31.description: Circumstances justifying lethal force in self-defence
key_points: Assault likely to cause grievous hurt
Wrongful restraint to commit sexual assault

section_32.title: When such right extends to causing any harm other than death
key_points: Any assault not covered by Section 31

section_33.title: Commencement and continuance of the right of private defence of the body

section_34.title: When the right of private defence of property extends to causing death
key_points: Theft, robbery, mischief or house-trespass by night
Mischief by fire to dwelling or property
Theft, mischief or trespass with intention to cause death/grievous hurt

section_35.title: When such right extends to causing any harm other than death
key_points: Property crimes not covered by Section 34

section_36.title: Commencement and continuance of the right of private defence of property

section_43.title: Abetment
section_43.description: Definition of abetment - assisting in commission of offence
key_points: Engaging in conspiracy to commit offence

section_44.title: Abettor
section_44.description: Person who abets commission of an offence
key_points: One who instigates, conspires or aids

section_45.title: Abetment of offence by the public or by more than ten persons

section_46.title: Punishment of abetment if the act abetted is committed
section_46.description: Punishment when abetted offence is committed

section_47.title: Punishment of abetment of offences punishable with death or life imprisonment
key_points: Life imprisonment - imprisonment up to 14 years

section_48.title: Punishment of abetment if the person abetted does an act with a different intention

section_49.title: Punishment of abetment if the act causing harm different from that intended

section_50.title: Punishment of abetment if abettor or person abetted is a public servant
section_50.description: Enhanced punishment for public servant involvement

section_51.title: Abetment of assault by soldier, sailor or airman

section_52.title: Abetment of mutiny or attempting to seduce a soldier, sailor or airman
key_points: Punishment: life imprisonment or 10 years imprisonment with fine

section_53.title: Criminal conspiracy
section_53.description: Agreement to commit illegal act or legal act by illegal means
key_points: Agreement between two or more persons
To commit illegal act or legal act by illegal means
Punishment: 6 months imprisonment or fine or both

section_54.title: Punishment for criminal conspiracy
key_points: Death/life imprisonment conspiracies: life imprisonment or 10 years + fine
Other serious offences: same punishment as substantive offence
General conspiracy: 6 months or fine or both

section_55.title: Waging war against Government of India
section_55.description: Most serious offence against the state

section_56.title: Conspiracy to commit offences punishable by section 55
key_points: Life imprisonment or imprisonment up to 10 years

section_57.title: Collecting arms, etc., with intention of waging war

section_58.title: Concealing with intent to facilitate design to wage war
section_58.description: Concealing plans of war against government

section_59.title: Assaulting President, Governor, etc.
key_points: Covers President, Governor, and other specified authorities

section_60.title: Sedition
section_60.description: Actions to bring hatred or disaffection towards government
key_points: Exciting disaffection towards Government of India
Life imprisonment or 3 years imprisonment with fine
Explanation clarifies lawful criticism is not sedition

section_61.title: Imputations, assertions prejudicial to national integration
key_points: 3 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_62.title: Acts endangering sovereignty, unity and integrity of India
key_points: 7 years imprisonment or fine or both

chapter_8.title: Of Offences Relating to the Army, Navy and Air Force

section_71.title: Abetting mutiny, or attempting to seduce a soldier, sailor or airman from his duty
key_points: Life imprisonment or 10 years with fine

section_72.title: Abetment of mutiny, if mutiny is committed
key_points: Death penalty or life imprisonment with fine

section_73.title: Abetment of assault by soldier, sailor or airman on his superior officer

section_74.title: Abetment of desertion of soldier, sailor or airman
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_75.title: Harbouring deserter
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_76.title: Deserter concealed on board merchant vessel through negligence of master

section_77.title: Unlawful assembly
section_77.description: Assembly of 5 or more persons with common object
key_points: 5 or more persons with common unlawful object
6 months imprisonment or fine or both

section_78.title: Rioting
key_points: Use of force or violence by unlawful assembly
2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_79.title: Rioting, armed with deadly weapon
key_points: 3 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_80.title: Punishment for rioting
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_81.title: Joining unlawful assembly armed with deadly weapon
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_82.title: Unlawful assembly or rioting in place of worship, etc.

section_83.title: Affray
key_points: 1 month imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 1000 or both

section_84.title: Promoting enmity between different groups
key_points: 3 years imprisonment or fine or both
Promoting enmity on grounds of religion, race, caste, etc.
Enhanced punishment in place of worship

section_85.title: Imputations, assertions prejudicial to national integration
key_points: 3 years imprisonment or fine or both

chapter_10.title: Of Offences by or Relating to Public Servants

section_92.title: Public servant taking gratification other than legal remuneration
key_points: 3 years to life imprisonment with fine

section_93.title: Taking gratification in order to influence public servant by corrupt or illegal means

section_94.title: Taking gratification for exercise of personal influence with public servant

section_95.title: Punishment for abetment of offences under sections 92 to 94

section_96.title: Public servant obtaining any valuable thing, without consideration or for inadequate consideration

section_97.title: Public servant disobeying direction of law
key_points: 1 year imprisonment or fine or both

section_98.title: Public servant framing incorrect document with intent to cause injury

section_99.title: Public servant unlawfully engaging in trade
key_points: 1 year imprisonment or fine or both

section_100.title: Public servant in judicial proceeding corruptly making report, etc., contrary to law

chapter_11.title: Of Contempts of the Lawful Authority of Public Servants

section_116.title: Voluntarily obstructing public servant in discharge of public functions
key_points: 3 months imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 2500 or both

section_117.title: Omission to assist public servant when bound by law to give assistance
section_117.description: Failure to assist when legally required
key_points: 1 month imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 1000 or both

section_118.title: Disobedience to order duly promulgated by public servant
key_points: 1 month imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 1000 or both

section_119.title: Resistance or obstruction to lawful apprehension
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_120.title: Escape from custody or rescue
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_121.title: Resistance or obstruction in lawful discharge of duty of public servant, or any other person
key_points: 6 months imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 2500 or both

chapter_12.title: Of False Evidence and Offences Against Public Justice

section_131.title: Perjury
section_131.description: False statement on oath in judicial proceeding

section_132.title: Fabricating false evidence
key_points: Intent to use in legal proceeding

section_134.title: Fabricating false evidence with intent to procure conviction of capital offence
key_points: Life imprisonment or 10 years with fine

section_135.title: Giving or fabricating false evidence with intent to procure conviction of offence punishable with life imprisonment or imprisonment for seven years or upwards

section_136.title: Using evidence known to be false
key_points: Same punishment as giving false evidence

section_137.title: Issuing or signing false certificate
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_138.title: Using as true a certificate known to be false
key_points: Same punishment as issuing false certificate

chapter_13.title: Of Offences Relating to Coin and Government Stamps

section_170.title: Making or selling instrument for counterfeiting coin

section_171.title: Making or selling instrument for counterfeiting Indian coin

section_172.title: Possession of instrument or material for purpose of using the same for counterfeiting coin

section_173.title: Counterfeiting currency-notes or bank-notes
key_points: Life imprisonment or 10 years with fine

section_174.title: Using as genuine, forged or counterfeit currency-notes or bank-notes
key_points: Life imprisonment or 10 years with fine

section_175.title: Possession of forged or counterfeit currency-notes or bank-notes

section_176.title: Making or possessing instruments or materials for forging or counterfeiting currency-notes or bank-notes
key_points: Life imprisonment or 10 years with fine

section_177.title: Effacing writing from substance bearing Government stamp, or removing from document a stamp used for it, with intent to cause loss to Government

section_178.title: Using Government stamp known to have been before used
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_179.title: Erasure of mark denoting that stamp has been used

chapter_14.title: Of Offences Relating to Weights and Measures

section_188.title: Using false weight or measure
key_points: 1 year imprisonment or fine or both

section_189.title: Making or selling false weight or measure

section_190.title: Being in possession of false weight or measure

section_191.title: Making or selling instrument for weighing designed to deceive

chapter_15.title: Of Offences Affecting the Human Body

section_192.title: Culpable homicide
section_192.description: Causing death by doing act with knowledge it's likely to cause death
key_points: Knowledge or intention to cause death

section_193.title: Murder
key_points: Intention to cause bodily injury likely to cause death
Knowledge that act is imminently dangerous to life
Death penalty or life imprisonment with fine

section_194.title: Culpable homicide not amounting to murder
key_points: Life imprisonment or 10 years with fine

section_195.title: Causing death by negligence
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_196.title: Causing death by rash or negligent act not amounting to culpable homicide

section_221.title: Voluntarily causing hurt
section_221.description: Intentionally causing bodily pain, disease or infirmity
key_points: 1 year imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 5000 or both

section_223.title: Voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons or means

section_224.title: Voluntarily causing grievous hurt by dangerous weapons or means
key_points: Life imprisonment or 10 years with fine

section_225.title: Act endangering life or personal safety of others
key_points: 3 months imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 1000 or both

section_238.title: Rape
key_points: Rigorous imprisonment not less than 10 years, may extend to life

section_239.title: Sexual intercourse by husband upon his wife during separation

section_240.title: Rape in certain circumstances
key_points: Rigorous imprisonment not less than 10 years to life
Enhanced punishment for position of authority

section_241.title: Gang rape
key_points: Rigorous imprisonment not less than 20 years to life or death

section_242.title: Rape on woman under sixteen years of age
key_points: Rigorous imprisonment not less than 20 years to life or death

section_243.title: Sexual intercourse by person in authority
section_243.description: Abuse of authority for sexual intercourse

section_244.title: Assault or criminal force to woman with intent to outrage her modesty

section_245.title: Sexual harassment
key_points: Physical contact, sexually colored remarks, etc.

section_246.title: Assault or criminal force to woman with intent to disrobe

section_248.title: Stalking
section_248.description: Following or contacting despite clear indication of disinterest
key_points: First conviction: 3 years imprisonment with fine

section_253.title: Kidnapping
key_points: From India or from lawful guardianship

section_254.title: Kidnapping from India
section_254.description: Taking person out of India against will

section_256.title: Abduction
section_256.description: Inducing person to go from place by force or deceit

section_257.title: Kidnapping or abducting in order to murder
key_points: Life imprisonment or 10 years with fine

section_258.title: Kidnapping or abducting with intent to cause wrongful confinement

section_259.title: Kidnapping or abducting in order to subject person to grievous hurt, slavery, etc.

section_260.title: Kidnapping or abducting woman to compel marriage, etc.

section_262.title: Selling minor for purposes of prostitution, etc.
key_points: 10 years to life imprisonment with fine

section_263.title: Buying minor for purposes of prostitution, etc.
key_points: 10 years to life imprisonment with fine

section_264.title: Importation of girl from foreign country

section_266.title: Trafficking of persons
key_points: 7-10 years imprisonment with fine Rs. 1-10 lakh

wrongful_restraint.title: Of Wrongful Restraint and Wrongful Confinement

section_274.title: Wrongful restraint
key_points: 1 month imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 2500 or both

section_275.title: Wrongful confinement
key_points: 1 year imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 5000 or both

section_276.title: Wrongful confinement for three or more days

section_277.title: Wrongful confinement for ten or more days

section_278.title: Wrongful confinement in secret
key_points: 2 years imprisonment in addition to base punishment

section_281.title: Assault
section_281.description: Making gesture or preparation to use criminal force
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 1000 or both

section_282.title: Criminal force
key_points: 3 months imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 1500 or both

section_283.title: Punishment for criminal force
key_points: 3 months imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 1500 or both

section_284.title: Assault or criminal force to deter public servant from discharge of duty
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_285.title: Assault or criminal force to woman with intent to outrage her modesty
key_points: Assault or criminal force on woman

section_286.title: Assault or criminal force with intent to dishonour person
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_298.title: Bigamy
key_points: Second marriage during subsistence of first

section_300.title: Marriage ceremony fraudulently gone through without lawful marriage

section_301.title: Dishonestly or fraudulently going through marriage ceremony

section_303.title: Marrying minor
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 1 lakh or both

section_304.title: Promoting or permitting marriage of minor
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine up to Rs. 1 lakh or both

section_305.title: Defamation
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both
Lowering reputation in estimation of others

section_306.title: Punishment for defamation
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_307.title: Printing or engraving matter knowing it to be defamatory
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_308.title: Sale of printed or engraved substance containing defamatory matter
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

chapter_18.title: Of Criminal Intimidation, Insult and Annoyance

section_309.title: Criminal intimidation
section_309.description: Threatening to cause injury to person, reputation or property
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_310.title: Punishment for criminal intimidation
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_312.title: Insult intended to provoke breach of peace
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both
Likely to provoke breach of peace

section_313.title: Act caused by inducing person to believe that he will be rendered an object of Divine displeasure
key_points: 1 year imprisonment or fine or both

chapter_19.title: Of Theft, Extortion, Robbery and Dacoity

section_314.title: Theft
key_points: 3 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_315.title: Punishment for theft
key_points: 3 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_317.title: Theft by clerk or servant of property in possession of master

section_318.title: Theft after preparation made for causing death, hurt or restraint

section_319.title: Extortion
section_319.description: Intentionally putting person in fear to deliver property
key_points: 3 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_320.title: Punishment for extortion
key_points: 3 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_321.title: Robbery
key_points: Or putting in fear of violence

section_322.title: Dacoity
section_322.description: Robbery by five or more persons
key_points: Life imprisonment or 10 years rigorous imprisonment with fine

section_323.title: Punishment for dacoity
key_points: Life imprisonment or 10 years rigorous imprisonment with fine

section_325.title: Being member of gang of dacoits
key_points: Life imprisonment or 10 years rigorous imprisonment with fine

chapter_20.title: Of the Receiving of Stolen Property and Other Offences Relating to Stolen Property

section_347.title: Receiving stolen property
section_347.description: Dishonestly receiving or retaining stolen property
key_points: 3 years imprisonment or fine or both
Knowledge or reason to believe property is stolen

section_348.title: Punishment for receiving stolen property
section_348.description: General punishment for receiving stolen goods
key_points: 3 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_350.title: Receiving stolen property knowing that gang of dacoits committed the theft
key_points: Life imprisonment or 10 years rigorous imprisonment with fine

section_351.title: Dishonest misappropriation of property
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_352.title: Punishment for dishonest misappropriation of property
key_points: 2 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_353.title: Criminal breach of trust
section_353.description: Dishonestly using or disposing entrusted property
key_points: 3 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_354.title: Punishment for criminal breach of trust
section_354.description: General punishment for breach of trust
key_points: 3 years imprisonment or fine or both

section_355.title: Criminal breach of trust by carrier, etc.
section_355.description: Breach of trust by carriers and agents

section_356.title: Criminal breach of trust by clerk or servant

section_357.title: Cheating
section_357.description: Dishonestly inducing person to deliver property
key_points: 1 year imprisonment or fine or both

section_358.title: Punishment for cheating
key_points: 1 year imprisonment or fine or both

key_changes_from_ipc: Introduction of community service as punishment
Updated definition of rape with detailed consent provisions
New offences like stalking, voyeurism added
Enhanced punishment for crimes against women and children
Trafficking of persons as separate offence

important_definitions.dishonestly: Wrongful gain to oneself or wrongful loss to another
important_definitions.injury: Illegally causing harm to person, reputation or property
important_definitions.wrongful_gain: Gain by unlawful means of property to which person is not legally entitled
important_definitions.wrongful_loss: Loss by unlawful means of property to which person is legally entitled
important_definitions.movable_property: Corporeal property of every description except land and things attached to earth
important_definitions.public_servant: Includes government officials, judges, police officers, military personnel, etc.
important_definitions.document: Any matter expressed or described upon any substance by means of letters, figures or marks
important_definitions.valuable_security: Document evidencing legal right to payment of money or transferable interest
important_definitions.will: Legal declaration of intention of testator with respect to property after death

offences: Waging war against Government of India (Section 55)
Abetment of mutiny if mutiny is committed (Section 72)
death_penalty.conditions: Only in rarest of rare cases as per judicial precedent

offences: Waging war against Government of India (Section 55)
life_imprisonment.definition: Imprisonment for remainder of natural life

fine.range: No limit unless specified in particular section
fine.default_imprisonment: In case of default, simple imprisonment as specified

enhanced_protection: Specific provisions for stalking and voyeurism
Enhanced punishment for trafficking of minors

accountability: Enhanced punishment when public servant commits crime

procedural_aspects.investigation: Governed by Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita (Criminal Procedure)
procedural_aspects.evidence: Governed by Bharatiya Sakshya Adhiniyam (Evidence Act)
procedural_aspects.appeal: Right to appeal preserved in all cases

territorial_jurisdiction.applicability: Whole of India including Union Territories
extraterritorial_application: Citizens of India outside India for certain offences
Offences committed on ships and aircraft registered in India

enforcement_agencies: Other specialized agencies as per law

constitutional_compliance.fundamental_rights: All provisions must comply with constitutional rights
constitutional_compliance.due_process: Fair trial and natural justice principles
constitutional_compliance.prohibition_of_discrimination: No discrimination on grounds of religion, race, caste, sex, place of birth

implementation_guidelines.training_requirements: Police and judicial officers training on new provisions
implementation_guidelines.awareness_programs: Public awareness about new law provisions
